languages.text: "Ваша Светлость! Чудовищный шторм разразился на Янусе! Апокалиптические аномалии терзают наш агромир, и эпицентр их — оскверненный сектор! Необходимо что-то делать, пока вся колония не погибла! Необходимо... найти источник этого лиходейства!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A monstrous storm has broken out on Janus! The apocalyptic anomalies are tearing our agri-world apart, and their epicentre is in the desecrated sector! Something must be done before the whole colony is destroyed! We have... to find the source of this madness!"
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость! Чудовищный шторм разразился на Янусе! Апокалиптические аномалии терзают наш агромир, и эпицентр их — оскверненный сектор! Необходимо что-то делать, пока вся колония не погибла! Необходимо... найти источник этого лиходейства!"

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A monstrous storm has broken out on Janus! The apocalyptic anomalies are tearing our agri-world apart, and their epicentre is a desecrated sector! Something must be done before the whole colony is destroyed! We have... to find the source of this madness!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A monstrous storm has broken out on Janus! The apocalyptic anomalies are tearing our agri-world apart, and their epicentre is a desecrated sector! Something must be done before the whole colony is destroyed! We have... to find the source of this madness!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A monstrous storm has broken out on Janus! The apocalyptic anomalies are tearing our agri-world apart, and their epicentre is in the desecrated sector! Something must be done before the whole colony is destroyed! We have... to find the source of this madness!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A monstrous storm has broken out on Janus! The apocalyptic anomalies are tearing our agri-world apart, and their epicentre is in the desecrated sector! Something must be done before the whole colony is destroyed! We have... to find the source of this madness!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A monstrous storm has broken out on Janus! The apocalyptic anomalies are tearing our agri-world apart, and their epicentre is in the desecrated sector! Something must be done before the whole colony is destroyed! We have... to find the source of this madness!"

languages.text: “大人！一场极其凶暴的风暴袭击了加努斯！世界末日般的异象正在撕裂我们的农业世界，而它们的中心就在那片亵渎区域！我们得赶在整个殖民地被摧毁之前做点什么！我们必须……必须找到这疯狂的根源！”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A monstrous storm has broken out on Janus! The apocalyptic anomalies are tearing our agri-world apart, and their epicentre is in the desecrated sector! Something must be done before the whole colony is destroyed! We have... to find the source of this madness!"

traits.locale_text: “大人！一场极其凶暴的风暴袭击了加努斯！世界末日般的异象正在撕裂我们的农业世界，而它们的中心就在那片亵渎区域！我们得赶在整个殖民地被摧毁之前做点什么！我们必须……必须找到这疯狂的根源！”

languages.text: «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Una monstruosa tormenta se ha desatado en Janus! Las anomalías apocalípticas están destrozando nuestro agromundo, ¡y su epicentro está en el sector profanado! ¡Hay que hacer algo antes de que toda la colonia sea destruida! Tenemos... ¡Tenemos que encontrar la fuente de esta locura!».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A monstrous storm has broken out on Janus! The apocalyptic anomalies are tearing our agri-world apart, and their epicentre is in the desecrated sector! Something must be done before the whole colony is destroyed! We have... to find the source of this madness!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Una monstruosa tormenta se ha desatado en Janus! Las anomalías apocalípticas están destrozando nuestro agromundo, ¡y su epicentro está en el sector profanado! ¡Hay que hacer algo antes de que toda la colonia sea destruida! Tenemos... ¡Tenemos que encontrar la fuente de esta locura!».

languages.text: 「陛下！ヤヌスに巨大な嵐が発生しました！絶望的なアノマリーが農業惑星を引き裂き、その震央は冒涜されたセクターにあります！コロニー全体が破壊される前に何か手を打たなければなりません！この...狂気の源を探し当てねばなりません！」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A monstrous storm has broken out on Janus! The apocalyptic anomalies are tearing our agri-world apart, and their epicentre is in the desecrated sector! Something must be done before the whole colony is destroyed! We have... to find the source of this madness!"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下！ヤヌスに巨大な嵐が発生しました！絶望的なアノマリーが農業惑星を引き裂き、その震央は冒涜されたセクターにあります！コロニー全体が破壊される前に何か手を打たなければなりません！この...狂気の源を探し当てねばなりません！」

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie ! Une tempête gigantesque fait rage sur Janus ! Des anomalies apocalyptiques réduisent nos infrastructures agricoles en miettes, et l'épicentre du phénomène est devenu une zone totalement corrompue ! Il faut intervenir avant que la colonie tout entière disparaisse ! Il faut... il faut trouver la source de cette folie ! »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A monstrous storm has broken out on Janus! The apocalyptic anomalies are tearing our agri-world apart, and their epicentre is in the desecrated sector! Something must be done before the whole colony is destroyed! We have... to find the source of this madness!"

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie ! Une tempête gigantesque fait rage sur Janus ! Des anomalies apocalyptiques réduisent nos infrastructures agricoles en miettes, et l'épicentre du phénomène est devenu une zone totalement corrompue ! Il faut intervenir avant que la colonie tout entière disparaisse ! Il faut... il faut trouver la source de cette folie ! »

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Auf Janus ist ein monströser Sturm ausgebrochen! Die apokalyptischen Anomalien zerreißen unsere Agrarwelt, und ihr Epizentrum liegt im entweihten Sektor! Irgendetwas muss geschehen, bevor die ganze Kolonie zerstört wird! Wir müssen ... die Quelle dieses Irrsinns finden!"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A monstrous storm has broken out on Janus! The apocalyptic anomalies are tearing our agri-world apart, and their epicentre is in the desecrated sector! Something must be done before the whole colony is destroyed! We have... to find the source of this madness!"

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Auf Janus ist ein monströser Sturm ausgebrochen! Die apokalyptischen Anomalien zerreißen unsere Agrarwelt, und ihr Epizentrum liegt im entweihten Sektor! Irgendetwas muss geschehen, bevor die ganze Kolonie zerstört wird! Wir müssen ... die Quelle dieses Irrsinns finden!"
